scripts.build: pnpm p:shared build && pnpm p:reactivity build && pnpm p:components build && pnpm p:runtime build && pnpm p:transformer build && pnpm p:plugin build && pnpm p:core build
scripts.dev: concurrently 'pnpm p:shared dev' 'pnpm p:reactivity dev' 'pnpm p:components dev' 'pnpm p:runtime dev' 'pnpm p:transformer dev' 'pnpm p:plugin dev' 'pnpm p:core dev'
scripts.version:
printf '\033[1;36m%-10s | %-10s | %-10s\033[0m
' tool version which; printf '%-10s | %-10s | %-10s
' ---------- ---------- ----------; printf '%-10s | %-10s | %-10s
' '@antfu/ni' '' "$(which ni)"; printf '%-10s | %-10s | %-10s
' node "$(node -v)" "$(which node)"; printf '%-10s | %-10s | %-10s
' pnpm "v$(pnpm -v)" "$(which pnpm)"
scripts.release:all: nr p:shared release && nr p:reactivity release && nr p:components release && nr p:runtime release && nr p:core release && nr p:transformer release && nr p:plugin release
